# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which holds immense value for me. Given its unique features and quality, I believe it's worth more than $100. Considering the exceptional craftsmanship and benefits it offers, I am extending this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $150. This is an exclusive offer tailored for someone like you who appreciates high-quality products. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the unparalleled benefits of our product. Let me know if you have any questions or need further information. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer
